primevc.mvc.Proxy

type
class
extends
Notifier<EventsTypedef>
subclasses
sample.MainProxy
A Proxy manages a portion of the Model. Usually it manages a single value-object. It exposes methods and properties to allow other MVC-actors to manipulate it. A Proxy does not know anything outside of it's own world, and does not respond to signals. It however does send signals, for example when the value-object changes.
